entity_category_description.sourceData: Core entities such as chw, patient, etc
entity_category_description.label: Entity Category Description

sourceData.entity_category_description: Core entities such as chw, patient, etc

children.title: Insert Entity

children.defaultText:
Entities are database views which contain the data DOT will test. You provide the SQL for these views and DOT will generate them automatically. Typically each view is a select statement onto an underlying database table or view, but you can also use SQL to combine data from multiple objects.

Entity fields

Field Description Example
entity_name Entity name fandango_events
entity_category Entity category, using categories defined in DOT categories flamenco_dance
entity_definition The SQL statement which gets the data DOT will scan

SELECT * from dance_events where type = 'flamenco'

children.text: Are you sure you want to delete the "{{project_id_edit.text}}" project?

children.title: Insert Project

children.defaultText:
Each run of DOT will test data for a given project. Typically a project relates to a database where the data is, but it can also be a useful way to split DOT runs into different data groups.

Project fields

Field Description Example
project_id Identifier for the project ballroom_dancing
active Flag to indicate if the project is active for scanning. Useful for quickly activating/deactivating all tests for a given project ✓
description More details for the project

This project tests data as gathered by the ballroom dancing monitoring initiative

children.tooltip: Go back to the run log page

children.title: Insert category

children.defaultText:
The entities (database views) that contain the data DOT will test, can be assigned categories. This is useful for analysis and dashboards as test results can be shown by category.

Category fields

Field Description Example
entity_category Category flamenco_dance
description More details for the category

Data for dancing which originate from flamenco

Expect Similar Means Across Reporters Id Column

children.defaultText:
The tests DOT will run are defined here.  

Test fields

Field Description Example
test_activated A toggle to turn a tests on/off without having to delete them. ✓
project_id The project, as defined under 'Projects'

ballroom_dancing
description Description for the test Test that dancing shoes type is not null
priority Priority of the test (1-10) where 1 indicates test fails of this test need urgent attention. Useful for dashboarding 3
entity The entity (database view as defined under 'Entities') that the test will run against fandango_events
test_type Type of tests DOT performs. You will be prompted from a drop-down to set this not_null
column_name Column name a test should apply. Note, this isn't mandatory for all test types dancing_shoes
test_parameters JSON record defining parameters for the test

{

    form_name: 'dance_survey'

}
scenario_id Inconsistent or Problematic (IoP) data scenario. You will be prompted from a drop-down to set this. These scenarios can be modified/extended by updating the data in the dot.scenarios table INCONSISTENT-1
proposed_remediation Optional field to indicate remediation for tests that fail Escalate to dance development team

 

Bulk Activating/Deactivating tests

As well as activating and deactivating tests by editing individual tests, you can also bulk-select tests using the radio button on the far-left of the table, then clicking the 'Activate/Deactivate' button above the table.

Bulk Deletion of tests

Similar to bulk activation/deactivation, you can select multiple tests and delete them by clicking the 'Delete tests' button above the table.

actionConfiguration.body:
select 
   ce.*, 
   ec.description as "entity_category_description"
from 
   dot.configured_entities ce,
   dot.entity_categories ec
where   
   ce.entity_category = ec.entity_category
AND "entity_name" ilike '%{{data_table.searchText || ""}}%'
ORDER BY "{{data_table.sortOrder.column || 'entity_id'}}" {{data_table.sortOrder.order || 'ASC'}}
LIMIT {{data_table.pageSize}}
OFFSET {{(data_table.pageNo - 1) * data_table.pageSize}};

INSERT INTO dot."configured_entities" (
	"entity_name",
	"entity_category",
	"entity_definition",
	"date_added",
	"date_modified",
	"last_updated_by")
VALUES (
	'{{insert_form.formData.entity_name}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.entity_category}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.entity_definition}}',
	NOW(),
	NOW(),
	'{{appsmith.user.name}}');

UPDATE dot."configured_entities" SET
		"entity_name" = '{{entity_name.text}}',
		"entity_category" = '{{entity_category.selectedOptionValue}}',
    "entity_definition" = '{{entity_definition.text}}',
		"date_modified" = NOW(),
		"last_updated_by" = '{{appsmith.user.name}}'
WHERE "entity_id" = {{data_table.selectedRow.entity_id}};

select 
   description as "label",
   entity_category as "value"
from 
   dot.entity_categories
order by 
   description

DELETE FROM dot."projects"
  WHERE "project_id" = {{data_table.triggeredRow.project_id}};

SELECT 
    tr.test_result_id, 
		tr.status
FROM 
    dot."test_results" tr,
		dot.configured_entities ce
WHERE 
   ce.entity_id = tr.entity_id AND
   tr.view_name ilike '%{{data_table.searchText || ""}}%' AND
	 tr.run_id = '{{appsmith.URL.queryParams.run_id}}' AND
	 tr.test_id = '{{appsmith.URL.queryParams.test_id}}' 
ORDER BY "{{data_table.sortOrder.column || 'test_result_id'}}" {{data_table.sortOrder.order || 'ASC'}}
LIMIT {{data_table.pageSize}}
OFFSET {{(data_table.pageNo - 1) * data_table.pageSize}};

SELECT 
    dot.get_test_result_data_record(ce.entity_name, tr.id_column_name, 
    tr.id_column_value,'public_tests')
FROM 
    dot."test_results" tr,
		dot.configured_entities ce
WHERE 
	 tr.test_result_id = '{{data_table.selectedRow.test_result_id}}'  AND
	 tr.entity_id = ce.entity_id

SELECT 
   schema_name as "label",
	 schema_name as "value"
FROM information_schema.schemata
WHERE schema_name not like 'pg_%' AND schema_name != 'information_schema';

SELECT 
   ec.description as "x",   
   ROUND(100 * SUM(tr.rows_failed) / (1.0*SUM(tr.rows_total)),2) as "y"
FROM
   dot.scenarios s,
   dot.configured_tests ct,
   dot.test_results_summary tr,
   dot.configured_entities ce,
   dot.run_log rl,
   dot.entity_categories ec 
WHERE 
   s.scenario_id=ct.scenario_id AND
   tr.test_id=ct.test_id AND
   ce.entity_id = ct.entity_id and 
   rl.run_id = tr.run_id and 
   ce.entity_category = ec.entity_category and
	 rl.run_id = '{{appsmith.URL.queryParams.run_id}}'
group by
   ec.description

DELETE FROM dot."configured_entities"
  WHERE "entity_id" = {{data_table.triggeredRow.entity_id}};

SELECT 
   rl.run_start as "Run date",
   ct.project_id,
   ct.description as "Test",
   ce.entity_name as "Entity",   
   ct.test_type as "Test type",
   s.scenario_id as "Scenario",
   tr.test_status as "Test status",
   tr.rows_total as "Rows tested",
   tr.rows_failed as "Rows failed",
   ROUND(100 * tr.rows_failed / (1.0*tr.rows_total),2) as "% fail",
	 tr.run_id as "Run id",
	 tr.test_id as "Test id"
FROM
   dot.scenarios s,
   dot.configured_tests ct,
   dot.test_results_summary tr,
   dot.configured_entities ce,
   dot.run_log rl
WHERE 
   s.scenario_id=ct.scenario_id AND
   tr.test_id=ct.test_id AND
   ce.entity_id = ct.entity_id and 
   rl.run_id = tr.run_id AND 
	 rl.project_id ilike '%{{data_table.searchText || ""}}%' AND
	 rl.run_id = '{{appsmith.URL.queryParams.run_id}}'
ORDER BY "{{data_table.sortOrder.column || 'Run id'}}" {{data_table.sortOrder.order || 'ASC'}}
LIMIT {{data_table.pageSize}}
OFFSET {{(data_table.pageNo - 1) * data_table.pageSize}};

INSERT INTO dot."projects" (
	"project_id",
	"description",
	"active",
	"project_schema",
	"contacts",
	"last_updated_by",
	"date_modified",
	"date_added")
VALUES (
	'{{insert_form.formData.project_id}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.description}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.active}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.project_schema}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.contacts}}',
	'{{appsmith.user.name}}',
	 NOW(),
   NOW()
);

INSERT INTO dot."configured_tests" (
    "test_activated" ,
		"project_id",
		"scenario_id" ,
		"priority",
		"description" ,
		"impact",
		"proposed_remediation" ,
		"entity_id",
		"test_type" ,
		"column_name" ,
		"test_parameters",
	  "last_updated_by",
	  "date_added",
	  "date_modified"
)
VALUES (
    {{test_activated__add.isChecked}},
		'{{project_id__add.selectedOptionValue}}',
		'{{scenario_id__add.selectedOptionValue}}',
		{{priority__add.selectedOptionValue}},
		'{{description__add.text}}',
		'{{impact__add.text}}',
		'{{proposed_remediation__add.text}}',
		'{{entity_id__add.selectedOptionValue}}',
		'{{test_type__add.selectedOptionValue}}',
		'{{column_name__add.selectedOptionValue}}',
		'{{test_parameters__add.text == '' ? undefined : test_parameters__add.text}}',
	  '{{appsmith.user.name}}',
	  NOW(),
	  NOW()
);

UPDATE dot."configured_tests" SET
    "test_activated" = {{test_activated.isChecked}},
		"project_id" = '{{project_id.selectedOptionValue}}',
		"scenario_id" = '{{scenario_id.selectedOptionValue}}',
		"priority" = {{priority.selectedOptionValue}},
		"description" = '{{description.text}}',
		"impact" = '{{impact.text}}',
		"proposed_remediation" = '{{proposed_remediation.text}}',
		"entity_id" = '{{entity_id.selectedOptionValue}}',
		"test_type" = '{{test_type.selectedOptionValue}}',
		"column_name" = '{{column_name__edit.selectedOptionValue}}',
		"test_parameters" = '{{test_parameters.text}}',
		"last_updated_by" = '{{appsmith.user.name}}',
		"date_modified" = NOW()
  WHERE "test_id" = '{{configured_tests.selectedRow.test_id}}';

SELECT 
    test_type,
		replace(replace(string_agg(CONCAT('"' , parameter , '": "' , example, '"'), ', '),'"[','['),']"',']') as "json_sample"
FROM   
    dot.test_parameters_interface
WHERE
		test_type = '{{test_type.selectedOptionValue == undefined || test_type.selectedOptionValue == '' ? test_type__add.selectedOptionValue : test_type.selectedOptionValue}}'
GROUP BY 
    test_type;

UPDATE dot."entity_categories" SET
    "entity_category" = '{{entity_category.text}}',
		"description" = '{{description.text}}'
WHERE "entity_category" = {{data_table.selectedRow.entity_category}};
select test_type as "label", test_type as "value" from dot.test_types ORDER by test_type;
select test_type from dot.test_types where uses_column=true;

UPDATE dot."projects" SET
		"project_id" = '{{project_id_edit.text}}',
		"description" = '{{project_description_edit.text}}',
		"active" = '{{active_edit.isChecked}}',
		"project_schema" = '{{project_schema_edit.selectedOptionValue}}',
		"contacts" = '{{contacts_edit.text}}',
		"last_updated_by" = '{{appsmith.user.name}}',
		"date_modified" = NOW()
WHERE "project_id" = '{{data_table.selectedRow.project_id}}';

DELETE FROM dot."entity_categories"
  WHERE "entity_category" = {{data_table.triggeredRow.entity_category}};
UPDATE dot.configured_tests SET test_activated = {{this.params.test_activated_bulk}} WHERE test_id in {{ this.params.test_ids }};
select CONCAT(cause_sub_category, ' - ', scenario) as "label", scenario_id as "value" from dot.scenarios;
() => !!configured_tests.selectedRows.length

INSERT INTO dot."entity_categories" (
	"entity_category",
	"description")
VALUES (
	'{{insert_form.formData.entity_category}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.description}}');

DELETE FROM dot."configured_tests"
  WHERE "test_id" = {{configured_tests.triggeredRow.test_id}};
select test_type from dot.test_types where uses_parameters=true;

SELECT 
   rl.run_start as "Run_date",
   rl.project_id as "Project_id",
   SUM(tr.rows_total) as "Rows_tested",
   SUM(tr.rows_failed) as "Rows_failed",
   ROUND(100 * SUM(tr.rows_failed) / (1.0*SUM(tr.rows_total)),2) as "% fail",
	 rl.run_id as "Run_id",
	 rl.run_status as "Run status",
	 rl.run_error as "Run error"
from
   dot.run_log rl
left outer join dot.test_results_summary tr ON rl.run_id = tr.run_id
group BY 
   rl.run_start,
	 rl.run_id,
	 rl.run_status,
	 rl.run_error
select project_id as "label", project_id as "value" from dot.projects;
select entity_name as "label", entity_id as "value" from dot.configured_entities;

unpublishedAction.name: bulkUpdate

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
    isc.column_name as "label",
		isc.column_name as "value"
FROM 
    INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS isc,
    dot.configured_entities ce
where
    ce.entity_name = isc.table_name 
    and ce.entity_id = '{{entity_id.selectedOptionValue == undefined || entity_id.selectedOptionValue == '' ? entity_id__add.selectedOptionValue : entity_id.selectedOptionValue}}'
order by column_name;

SELECT 
  ct.*,
  ce.entity_name
FROM 
  dot."configured_tests" ct,
  dot."configured_entities" ce
where 
  ce.entity_id = ct.entity_id
AND "description" ilike '%{{configured_tests.searchText || ""}}%'
ORDER BY "{{col_select.selectedOptionValue}}" {{order_select.selectedOptionValue}}
LIMIT {{configured_tests.pageSize}}
OFFSET {{(configured_tests.pageNo - 1) * configured_tests.pageSize}};

unpublishedAction.name: testUsesColumn
bulkDelete
testUsesParameters

actionConfiguration.body:
-- WARNING!!! If you change this query, you will lose all field parameters on the test_parameters form

SELECT
        CONCAT('{',replace(replace(string_agg(CONCAT('"' ,test_type, '%%%', parameter , '": "' , example, '"'), ', '),'"[','['),']"',']'),'}') as "all_test_params"
    FROM
        dot.test_parameters_interface

actionConfiguration.body: select test_type, parameter from dot.test_parameters_interface;
